scripts.deploy-local: wait-on tcp:8545 forge script script/Registry.s.sol:DeployRegistry --rpc-url http://localhost:8545  --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 --broadcast
scripts.export:abi: forge build && cp out/Registry.sol/Registry.json abi/Registry.json && cp out/NFT.sol/NFT.json abi/NFT.json
scripts.deploy: dotenv -- zx deploy.mjs && yarn bindings && yarn export:abi && yarn copy:client
scripts.start:node: anvil -m 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk'
scripts.copy:client: cp deployment.json ../client/node_modules/@dfdao/dynasty && cp -r abi ../client/node_modules/@dfdao/dynasty && cp -r types ../client/node_modules/@dfdao/dynasty
